Places To Camp

Bertozzi Conservation Area

This is a beautiful riverside property that includes wide dirt trails through the forest and a well loved swimming hole. A camping area on the river near a swimming hole. Please see the Groton Conservation Commission link below for more details about obtaining a permit.
